an5.12:1.5: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam sekhabalanam etam aggam etam sangahikam etam sanghataniyam, yadidam pannabalam.
an5.12:2.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, kutagarassa etam aggam etam sangahikam etam sanghataniyam, yadidam kutam.
an5.12:2.2: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, imesam pancannam sekhabalanam etam aggam etam sangahikam etam sanghataniyam, yadidam pannabalam.
an5.12:3.2: ‘saddhabalena samannagata bhavissama sekhabalena, hiribalena … ottappabalena … viriyabalena … pannabalena samannagata bhavissama sekhabalena’ti.
